word:
"Every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God. . . . If we love one another God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us." "God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him." The entire law is fulfilled in him who loves God with all his heart, and his neighbor as himself. This is "glory to God in the 
                                                                           1467
highest, and on earth peace, goodwill toward men." O, it is not weakness to have a tender, humble, sympathetic, pitying heart. Of this no one should be ashamed as if it were a weakness. It is strength derived from Christ.
